Get the best VPN for your website! Surf privately and securely with lightning-fast speed.

TikVPN protects your privacy, security, and anonymity. Watch Streaming videos all over the world with one click. No logs, bank-level encryption, 7/24 real-time chat support, and one-click connection.

The features of TikVPN:
√ 7/24 live chat support
√ Multiple servers
√ Security and privacy protection
√ One account for multiple devices such as iPhone and iMac at the same time
√ No time or bandwidth restrictions
√ No activity log, no connection log
√ Simple, one-click connection
√ Automatically select the fastest VPN server
√ Hide your IP
√ Strong encryption function

- Anonymous surfing
In the greatest online anonymity effort, TikVPN hides your real IP and PIN (personal identification number) so that ISP or any third party (even us) cannot track or analyze your online identity and activities. We provide a neutral and independent VPN service and will never track or analyze any of your logs. Just help you stay completely anonymous in your office, home, airport, coffee shop, or anywhere else.

- Protect privacy and block WiFi hotspots
When connected to a public WiFi hotspot, TikVPN can protect your network traffic from hacker attacks or tracking. Regardless of whether your password or personal data is encrypted or plaintext before transmission, TikVPN will encrypt it again. It provides strong protection for sensitive privacy. Protecting your privacy from improper attacks, tracking or disclosure is our most important mission.

- Use encryption to browse safely
When using TikVPN to connect, stay secure with bank-level encrypted traffic between your device and our servers. It provides strong protection for your connection through strong encryption. Fully protect your privacy and provide you with security protection, which will enable you to be effectively protected.

-Servers in hundreds of regions around the world
Our high-speed VPN servers are located in nearly 100 locations around the world and are constantly updated. Including but not limited to the United States, Canada, Australia, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Denmark, France, and the Netherlands, and will expand to more and more countries. TikVPN has a fast connection with a dedicated streaming media server, large bandwidth, and is easy to use.
